sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Planet from '../../orbitStories/Planet'
import Display from './Display'
import { Link } from 'docz'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"introduction"}}>{`Introduction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Orbit-client is a declarative React client for Orbitjs.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Orbit is a framework for orchestrating access, transformation, and synchronization between data sources.
Visit `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://orbitjs.com/"}}>{`https://orbitjs.com/`}</MDXTag>{` for more information.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Orbit-client enables you to request, transform and render your data effortlessly.`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={`<Planet id="earth">
  {({ planet, loading, error }) => (
    <Display object={{ planet, loading, error }} />
  )}
</Planet>`} __scope={{props,Planet,Display}}>
  <Planet id='earth'>
    {({ planet, loading, error }) => <Display object={{ planet, loading, error }}/>}
  </Planet>
</Playground></MDXTag>
